sourcesContent:
<template>
    <FormRow>
        <template v-slot:label> {{ $t('message') }}: </template>
        <template v-slot:inputs>
            <ValidationProvider
                v-slot="{ errors }"
                vid="message"
                :name="$t('message')"
                :rules="validationRules.message"
                tag="div"
                class="inputs-container"
            >
                <ErrorTooltip :errors="errors">
                    <textarea v-model="plain" wrap="off" class="textarea-size textarea-style" :placeholder="$t('please_enter_notes')" />
                </ErrorTooltip>
            </ValidationProvider>
        </template>
    </FormRow>
</template>

<script lang="ts">
import { MessageInputTs } from './MessageInputTs';
export default class MessageInput extends MessageInputTs {}
</script>
